sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { PropTypes } from "prop-types" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { addReciepe } from "../../redux/action/foodAction" class Addform extends Component { state = { name: "", ingridents: "", desc: "", type: "", process: [] } saveSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const newFood = { name: this.state.name, ingridents: this.state.ingridents, desc: this.state.desc, type: this.state.type, process: this.state.process } console.log(newFood) this.props.addReciepe(newFood) } onChangeHandaler = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } render() { return (
